title: News
creator_credit: Tim King, Mike Wooller and British Broadcasting Corporation
brief_description: Shows how the news is gathered and presented on the 9 o’clock news on BBC1, including the build-up of tension among the team when making time and location checks. Great “bird’s-eye” view of the news team.
creator_credit_for_label: Tim King, Mike Wooller and British Broadcasting Corporation
